plot: A short documentary about the old couple whose job is to light the old-fashioned lamp-posts in the oldest park of Warsaw. It's also a story of their love.
title: Latarnicy
plot_es: A short documentary about the old couple whose job is to light the old-fashioned lamp-posts in the oldest park of Warsaw. It's also a story of their love.
